title: new site... new fonts...
content:
hela hola!

new site.. new fonts... & a new URL...  
and it's all for free... yepyep!...

[www.fontoville.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014124632/http:/www.fontoville.com/ "www.fontoville.com")

gr!

raymond.
author: raymonster

comments.content:
Awesome! Great fonts and site design!

I'll admit, when I heard the word "free" in front of font, I shuddered. But I was wrong. :) Beautiful!

Raymond you have some fun ideas, but you need to learn a few things, still (as do I, they're just different things, is all). The first that comes to mind is spacing - I took a look at Vertigo, and the spacing was, umm, nonexistent.

Regards,

T
